name: cocoui
description: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/cocoui.scss dist/css/cocoui.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/cocoui-grid.scss dist/css/cocoui-grid.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/cocoui-reboot.scss dist/css/cocoui-reboot.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cocoui.min.css dist/css/cocoui.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cocoui-grid.min.css dist/css/cocoui-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/cocoui-reboot.min.css dist/css/cocoui-reboot.css
